prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that resembles a green orb with cute features and swirls.
I want a whimsical Pokemon that can float, with a soft color palette and adorable eyes.
Generate a creature that embodies tranquility, featuring subtle colors and a round, plushy shape.
Make a Pokemon with a unique psychic ability, characterized by its gentle appearance and soothing colors.
Imagine a small, fluffy Pokemon that has a calming presence and is often found in serene environments.
Design a friendly-looking Pokemon with a delicate body shape, showcasing pastel colors and unique facial features.
Show me a Pokemon that is primarily light green, with a whimsical design and an aura of mystery.
